abbot.script
Class Expression

java.lang.Object
  abbot.script.Step
      abbot.script.Expression
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLConstants, XMLifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class Expression
extends Step

Provides evaluation of arbitrary Java expressions. Any Java expression is supported, with a more loose syntax if desired. See the groovey documentation for complete details of the extended features available in this evaluator.

Note that any variables declared or assigned will be available to any subsequent steps in the same Script.

See Also:
Serialized Form
